action_item: Users & Roles - Personalize the application settings to improve user experience and efficiency.
notes: Focus on customizing the landing page and enabling powerful search options.

action_item: Security - Change the main login password for enhanced security.
notes: Ensure the password is updated regularly to protect sensitive patient data.

action_item: Security - Update the eSignature ID for secure document signing.
notes: Follow the two-step process for validation before changing the eSignature ID.

action_item: Security - Update the visual signature for documents.
notes: Validate identity before drawing a new signature.

action_item: Reports - Customize clinical document templates using CCDA format.
notes: Select and order the sections of patient charts to be included in clinical summaries.
